price: 4. Angelai ir Dvasia (t. y. Džibrilis (Gabrielius)) jos metu nusileidžia savo Viešpaties leidimu dėl kiekvieno reikalo.
arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tanazzalu al-malāikatu wal-rūḥu fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim min kulli amrin
